languages.text: "Как скажете, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира хитро улыбается и выпускает густое облако дыма в вашу сторону.{/n}
"Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как скажете, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира хитро улыбается и выпускает густое облако дыма в вашу сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "By all means, Lord Captain." {n}With a sly grin, Idira blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "By all means, Lord Captain." {n}With a sly grin, Idira blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

languages.text: « Bien sûr, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Idira vous décoche un sourire narquois en envoyant un épais rond de fumée dans votre direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Idira vous décoche un sourire narquois en envoyant un épais rond de fumée dans votre direction.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán». {n}Idira te dedica una sonrisa traviesa antes de lanzar una densa nube de humo en tu dirección.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán». {n}Idira te dedica una sonrisa traviesa antes de lanzar una densa nube de humo en tu dirección.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “没问题，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉对你露出了狡黠的笑容，随即朝你的方向吐出一口浓烟。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没问题，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉对你露出了狡黠的笑容，随即朝你的方向吐出一口浓烟。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン」{n}イディラは、あなたのほうに煙を吹きかけながら、はにかんだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン」{n}イディラは、あなたのほうに煙を吹きかけながら、はにかんだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain." {n}Idira grinst dich verschmitzt an und pustet einen dicken Rauchring in deine Richtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain." {n}Idira grinst dich verschmitzt an und pustet einen dicken Rauchring in deine Richtung.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Elbette Lord Kaptan." {n}İdira sana doğru kalın bir duman bulutu üflerken sinsi sinsi sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain." {n}Idira gives you a sly grin as she blows a thick cloud of smoke in your direction.{/n}
